your preferred method join in the round row2-ws sl1 purl 6 p2tog p1 turn work 3 rounds of stockinette first needle 32 stc second needle 34 stc row3-rs sl1 knit to 1 stc before gap ssk k1 turn leg row4-ws sl1 purl to 1 stc before the gap p2tog p1 turn work 60 rounds in pattern in the round repeat row 3 and 4 until all gap stcs have been worked ending with 18 stc after finishing on the ws turn work k until end of needle pick up 17 stc and knit note when knitting the last pick-up stitch i pick up the stitch below the first stitch on the second needle and knit them together so there will be no holes work needle 1 continuing the pattern panel from where you left pick up 17 stitches k10 pm knit until 2 stitches remaining on the heel needle k2tog the marker will help you keep track of the gusset and toe decreases knit needle 1 ssk knit to the marker you have finished 1 row of decrease continue decreasing every other row after finishing the 60 rounds work according to pattern until 32 stc remain on needle 2 on needle 1 and continue your heel flap foot heel flap 34 stc continue pattern on instep and stockinette on sole worked over all needle 2 stc only work a total of 11 chart
